name: Sir Ward
description:
Please play in fullscreen to fully enjoy the experience (1920x1080 recommended)

Sir Wards, a knight, discovered a treasure in a castle. However, while searching for the treasure, he picked up an artifact that caused him to travel back in time. He must now race against time to catch up with his soul... or die.

Controls:

  • LeftArrow : Left
  • RightArrow : Right
  • Space : Jump
  • E : Activate
  • N : Skip Rewind

This project was entirely made in 3 days for the CodingBlocks #23 with the theme "Everything is Backwards".

Our team:

  • Drenaya  - Developper and Game Designer
  • GalaxiGames  - Developper and Game Designer
  • arc4t  - Pixel Artist and Game Designer
  • Thalia33 - Music
